titleStmt.title: Love's dominion a dramatique piece full of excellent moralitie, written as a pattern for the reformed stage.
titleStmt.author: Flecknoe, Richard, d. 1678?

notesStmt.note: Later altered and printed with title: Love's kingdom.
Attributed to Richard Flecknoe. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
